nodeList.description: Summons a Volatile Zombie which shambles towards an enemy and explodes.
Zombies now leap towards their targets, up to a maximum distance.

node.description: Zombies deal more damage and have more movement speed (both multiplicative with other modifiers).
Summons a Volatile Zombie which shambles towards an enemy and explodes.

nodeList.description: Zombies deal more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) and the Zombies' health decays slower, but they also move slower.

node.description: You summon Zombies faster and Volatile Zombie costs less mana.
Summons a Volatile Zombie which shambles towards an enemy and explodes.

nodeList.altText: Both the area and damage modifiers also affect {Repulsive Vomit}.
nodeList.description: You now summon a single large zombie with more health, that deals more damage in a larger area (all multiplicative with other modifiers), but Volatile Zombie costs more mana.

node.description: Zombies deal more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) and the Zombies' health decays slower, but they also move slower.
You summon Zombies faster and Volatile Zombie costs less mana.
Summons a Volatile Zombie which shambles towards an enemy and explodes.

nodeList.description:
When a Zombie dies you have a chance to cast {Marrow Shards} from the Zombie towards a nearby enemy.

Marrow Shards does not cost health when cast this way.

node.description: You summon Zombies faster and Volatile Zombie costs less mana.
Summons a Volatile Zombie which shambles towards an enemy and explodes.

stats.statName: No Health Cost For Marrow Shards

nodeList.altText: This can be converted by {Flammable Vitae} or {Horrific Vessels}.
nodeList.description: Zombies will now {Vomit} on enemies before exploding, dealing physical and poison damage over time. Zombies lose 33% of their maximum health per second while vomiting.

node.description: The explosion has a chance to poison enemies.
You summon Zombies faster and Volatile Zombie costs less mana.
Summons a Volatile Zombie which shambles towards an enemy and explodes.
The explosion deals damage in a larger area.
Summons a Volatile Zombie which shambles towards an enemy and explodes.

nodeList.description: The explosion applies {Mark for Death} to enemies hit, but Volatile Zombie costs more mana.

node.description: The explosion's base physical and fire damage and {Vomit}'s base physical damage are converted to necrotic. Consequently their damage scales with increases to necrotic damage, but not increases to physical or fire damage.

Zombies instantly kill enemies that are below a health threshold (a percentage of their maximum health).

If you have a similar effect from an item or passive node then the highest threshold is used.
The explosion's hit deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) against bosses and rare enemies.
The explosion has an increased chance to stun enemies.
You summon Zombies faster and Volatile Zombie costs less mana.
Summons a Volatile Zombie which shambles towards an enemy and explodes.

stats.statName: Hit Damage to Bosses And Rare Enemies

nodeList.description:
When a Zombie dies you have a chance to cast {Sacrifice} on another nearby minion.

Sacrifice cast this way costs less mana.

node.description: Zombies now leap towards their targets, up to a maximum distance.

node.description: Summons a Volatile Zombie which shambles towards an enemy and explodes.

nodeList.altText: As an example, if the Zombie has 1000 max health, you are healed for 10 health when it explodes.
nodeList.description:
You are healed for a portion of the Zombies' maximum health when they explode. 

The amount of healing is increased by healing effectiveness.

node.description: The explosion deals damage in a larger area.
Summons a Volatile Zombie which shambles towards an enemy and explodes.

nodeList.altText: No effect if you have taken {Horrific Vessels}.
nodeList.description:
The explosion's base physical damage and {Vomit}'s base physical and poison damage are converted to fire. Consequently their damage scales with increases to fire damage, but not increases to physical or poison damage.

Poison chance from all sources is converted to ignite chance and effects related to poison now depend on ignite instead.

nodeList.altText: Infernal Shade is a spell that causes the target enemy and all nearby enemies take fire damage per second.
nodeList.description:
Zombies have a chance to cast {Infernal Shade} on the nearest enemy when the Zombie dies.

Infernal Shade cast this way costs less mana.
